channel.title: EvilScape | Beta
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][i][b]Welcome to EvilScape.[/b][/i][/size]
[b]Scroll down for pictures[/b]!
What makes EvilScape different? At EvilScape we are not concerned with making money. That is not our aim nor will it ever be. Our aim is to provide you an optimal experience followed by stellar gameplay to leave you thirsting for more. Your enjoyment of our game is what we strive for. You don’t need to pay to wear items that are overly advantageous, you don’t need to pay to explore EvilScape at its fullest; you don’t need to buy your experience here.
That’s how it is supposed to be. That is how we do it.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=erTN5lWgaXI[/youtube]
EvilScape Guide! (Xtrememan just logged in) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg515/scaled.php?server=515&filename=esgx.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Corporeal Beast! [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg406/scaled.php?server=406&filename=corpf.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Tormented Demons! [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg163/scaled.php?server=163&filename=torm.jpg&res=medium[/img]
King Black Dragon! [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg822/scaled.php?server=822&filename=kbdw.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Chaos Elemental! [img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/5973/chaosele.jpg[/img]
Recipe For Disaster! (Minigame) [img]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/7414/rfdl.jpg[/img]
Skilling Area [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg36/scaled.php?server=36&filename=skillsiiq.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Yay HILLIES! <3 [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg638/scaled.php?server=638&filename=hillies.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Dungeons! [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/4426/demonsn.jpg[/img]
Shops + EG Dialogue! [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/3353/npcsv.jpg[/img]
Tabs + Information [img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/608/rabs.jpg[/img]
Godwars! [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/8537/16945399.jpg[/img]
What's coming... [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YAtVEwl_cXg#[/youtube]
[code] The Incredible Learning Center Far-range bows Far-range magic A Reasonable Starter New hitmarks (If possible) Critical Hits Blocking spammers Ability to press enter to login instead of clicking login Vengeance on NPC New curses Extreme Potions A life-like rsps dialogue such as "How are you doing?" from Man Full doors Pvp Armors (All effects and specials) Chaotic weapons (Works just like RS) Tormented Demons - Correct Emotes/GFX Corperal Beast - Correct Emotes/GFX drops spirit shields/sigils Perfect Staff of Light Clipped Following Combat following 604 Gameplay RS Firecape 100% Skillcape Emotes 100% Pking 100% Bridding/Item Switching Barrows and effects Pk points and EP System Perfect Xp rates 100% Dragon claws with perfected emote 100% All godsword specials NO DUPES THERE IS NO "DONATOR ONLY" ITEMS! You can add it (tutorial in it). Anyone can use anything if they have the proper requirements! Shops are located in Varrock All spirit shields and their effects (Divine - Deducts 30% damage, Elysian - 70% chance to deduct, Arcane - +20 Magic Attack Bonus, and Spectral - +30 magic defence bonus) A perfect economy server Slayer helmet gives 50% extra exp when doing slayer Lock exp Every single skill works Saradomin Sword Spec[/code][/center]
